title: Tax Calculation output for Income Tax Calculation

calcName.description: The logical name of the calculator (e.g. meta data from the calculator)

calcVersion.description: The version number of the calculation (meta data from the calculator)

calcVersionDate.description: Date the calculator version became active (meta data from the calculator)

calcID.description: The calculation ID â€“ an 8 digit number with leading zeros that is unique to the identifier in the calculation input

sourceName.description: The name of the source system that requested the calculation

sourceRef.description: Internal reference from source system (for traceability purposes)

identifier.description: Identifies the entity for whom the calculation was performed (as supplied in calculation request)

year.description: This identifies the Tax Year to which the calculation relates in the format yyyy. NB. this is the ending year (e.g. Tax Year 2017-2018 would be expressed as 2018)

periodFrom.description: This defines the earliest point from which the calculation was performed. This will be the Accounting period start date (for self-employments) or the tax year start date, whichever occurs first.

periodTo.description: This defines the latest point to which the calculation was performed and will be the point in the year to which income has been received.

calcAmount.description: The high level calculated amount.  For Income Tax this is the year to date total amount of Income Tax and national Insurance.

calcTimestamp.description: Timestamp of when the calculation was performed

calcResult.description: An object containing the calculated result (this will be bespoke to the calcName)

incomeTaxNicYtd.description: Total of calculated Income Tax and National Insurance

incomeTaxNicDelta.description: Difference between the total of calculated Income Tax and National Insurance in this calculation and the previous calculation performed

crystallised.description: Indicates if the data represents the crystallised position for the Tax Year; if N then it is Year to Date

nationalRegime.description: This defines the national tax rates and rules to be applied. Values are UK and Scotland, May Change in future

totalTaxableIncome.description: Total Taxable Income. This is Total Income Received less the Total of Allowances and Deductions

taxableIncome.description: An object breaking down how taxable income is derived

totalIncomeTax.description: Total calculated Income Tax after allowances and reliefs

incomeTax.description: An object detailing the calculation of Income Tax

nic.description: An object detailing the calculation of National Insurance Contributions

eoyEstimate.description: An object containing end of year estimates

previousCalc.description: An object detailing the previous calculation (used to derive the delta calculation)

incomeReceived.description: An object breaking down income received by income sources

allowancesAndDeductions.description: An object detailing allowances and deductions

employmentIncome.description: Total employment income across all employments

shareSchemes.description: An object containing share scheme information

selfEmploymentIncome.description: Total taxable profit for all self employments

selfEmployment.description: An array of self employment income

partnership.description: An array of partnership source income

ukPropertyIncome.description: Profit from UK land and property

ukProperty.description: An object containing UK property income data

foreignDividendIncome.description: Amount of taxable income from foreign dividends

trustsIncome.description: Amount of taxable income from trust and estates

trusts.description: An object detailing trust and estate income

bbsiIncome.description: The amount of Interest from UK banks, building societies and securities etc

bbsi.description: An object detailing sources of bank and building society interest

ukDividendIncome.description: Amount of taxable income from dividends from UK companies

ukDividends.description: An object detailing UK dividend income

ukPensionsIncome.description: Amount of taxable UK pensions and state benefits

ukPensions.description: An object detailing pensions and state benefit source

gainsOnLifeInsuranceIncome.description: Amount of taxable gains on life insurance policies etc.

gainsOnLifeInsurance.description: An object detailing source for gains of life insurance

totalBenefitsAndExpenses.description: Total of Benefits and Expenses from all employments

totalAllowableExpenses.description: Total allowable expenses across all employments

latestDate.description: latest date for which income data has been supplies

netPay.description: The net pay YTD for the employment

benefitsAndExpenses.description: Benefits and expenses relating to the employment

allowableExpenses.description: Allowable expenses relating to the employment

latestDate.description: the latest date to which source data applies

taxableIncome.description: the taxable profit from the self-employment

finalised.description: Indicates if the taxable income for this self-employment is finalised

latestDate.description: the latest date to which source data applies

taxableIncome.description: the amount of taxable income from the partnership

latestDate.description: the latest date to which source data applies

taxableProfitFhlUk.description: taxable profit for UK furnished holiday lettings

taxableProfitFhlEea.description: taxable profit for EEA furnished holiday lettings

finalised.description: Indicates if the taxable income for all UK property is finalised

latestDate.description: the latest date to which source data applies
the latest date to which source data applies

paymentsIntoARetirementAnnuity.description: Payments into a retirement annuity contract etc.

foreignTaxOnEstates.description: Foreign tax on estates (tax credit relief not claimed)

giftOfInvestmentsAndPropertyToCharity.description: Gift of investments and property to charity

apportionedPersonalAllowance.description: The apportioned Personal Allowance from annual allowance or reduced personal allowance (if applicable)

blindPersonSurplusAllowanceFromSpouse.description: Blind Person's surplus allowance from spouse

totalBeforeReliefs.description: Total Income tax before allowances and reliefs and deductionsare applied

taxableIncome.description: The total income subject to Income Tax calculation

payPensionsProfit.description: An object containing data to the calculation of income tax against Pay Pensions and profit

savingsAndGains.description: An object containing tax band data for savings interest from banks or building societies, securities and gains on life policies

dividends.description: An object containing data to the calculation of income tax against dividend income

totalAllowancesAndReliefs.description: The total of allowances and reliefs

allowancesAndReliefs.description: An object containing the allowances and reliefs applied

totalAmount.description: Total amount of income tax relating to pay, pensions and profit

taxableIncome.description: Total amount of taxable income relating to pay, pensions and profit

band.description: An array of tax band data for pay, pensions and profit

name.description: The name of the Tax band

rate.description: The Tax band rate expressed as a percentage

threshold.description: The upper threshold of the band

apportionedThreshold.description: The apportioned upper threshold of the band

income.description: Income attributed to the tax band

taxAmount.description: The calculated amount of income tax for the band (bandIncome x bandRate)

surplusMarriedCoupleAllowanceAmount.description: Amount of Surplus Married Couple's Allowance from spouse/partner

surplusMarriedCoupleAllowanceRelief.description: Relief on Surplus Married Couple's Allowance from spouse/partner

notionalTaxFromLifePolicies.description: Notional tax from gains on life policies etc.

notionalTaxFromDividendsAndOtherIncome.description: Notional tax from stock dividends and other income

class2.description: An object relating to NIC Class 2 Calculation

class4.description: An object relating to NIC Class 4 Calculation

weeks.description: the number of weeks applied in calculation

apportionedLimit.description: Apportioned annual limit for NIC Class 2

band.description: An array detailing bands relating to NIC Class 4

calcTimestamp.description: The date and timestamp of when the previous calculation was performed

calcAmount.description: The previous calculation for YTD income tax and national insurance

name.description: The name of the Tax band

rate.description: The Tax band rate expressed as a percentage

threshold.description: The upper threshold of the band

apportionedThreshold.description: The apportioned upper threshold of the band

income.description: Income attributed to the tax band

amount.description: The calculated amount of income tax for the band (bandIncome x bandRate)

personalAllowance.description: The full Personal Allowance applicable to the Tax Year

reducedPersonalAllowanceThreshold.description: The income threshold at which the Personal Allowance is reduced

reducedPersonalisedAllowance.description: Reduced annual personal allowance if annual (or estimated annual) income exceeds the income threshold. Estimated annual income will be used for non-finalised calculations

totalTaxableIncome.description: Sum of estimated taxable income for all income sources

incomeTaxAmount.description: Calculated Income tax amount from estimated taxable income

incomeTaxNicAmount.description: Total of calculated Income Tax and National Insurance from estimated annual taxable income

eoyEstimateIncomeSourceArray.description: An array of annualised estimated income by income source

type.description: Indicates the income source type. Values are: 01=Employment; 02=Share schemes; 03=Self-Employment; 04=Partnership; 05=UK Land and Property;06=Foreign income; 07=Dividends from foreign companies; 08=Trusts and Estates; 09=Interest from UK banks, building societies and securities etc; 10=Dividends from UK companies; 11=UK pensions and state benefits; 12=Gains on life insurance policies etc.

supplied.description: Indicates if the estimate taxable income is supplied by the taxpayer (true) or calculated (false)

finalised.description: Indicates if the income source has been finalised for the tax year (only applies to self-employment and UK Property income types)

calcId.description: The calculation ID â€“ an 8 digit number with leading zeros that is unique to the identifier in the calculation input

wholePounds.description: Defines amounts given in whole pounds between 0.00 and 99.99

monetaryPos.description: Defines a monetary value (to 2 decimal places), between 0 and 99,999,999.99

monetaryNeg.description: Defines a monetary value (to 2 decimal places), between -99,999,999.99 and 0

monetaryPosNeg.description: Defines a monetary value (to 2 decimal places), between -99,999,999.99 and 99,999,999.99

percent.description: Defines a percentage rate (to 2 decimal places), between 0.00 and 99.99
